description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Sohar, Oman. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Oman Sohar Seaside Escape Minutes from the Sea
hotels.description: Only minutes from the sea, Crowne Plaza Sohar, an IHG Hotel, is your gateway to a vibrant seaside city escape. Rejuvenate yourself with a relaxing stroll through lush gardens, a refreshing dip in the pool or a sophisticated cocktail at the poolside bar. Get your heart racing as you revitalise your body and mind at the fitness centre or aim for a strike at the bowling alley. Savour traditional cuisine at the onsite restaurants before retiring to a stylish room.

seo.title: Hoteles en Sohar - Oman Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Sohar, Oman con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
